name: Together In Union
description:
2021 GMTK Game Jam Submission

CONTROLS : 

WASD to move 

Space to Interact

Q to drop Items

Try to bring all the villagers together for pray against the evils of the world

Made with  4 Other Fine People besides myself :

Poe(me) : Programmer

Gerhard Armada : Programmer

John Paul Apolinar : 3rd Party Intergration

Eli Ross - Composer, SFX Twitter: ThePixelPunch Business E-Mail: theofficialpixelpunch@gmail.com

Kolbe : Artist
